references.reason: This paper introduces classifier-free guidance, a crucial technique used in the proposed method for improving the quality and control of 3D generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models, which is highly relevant to the paper's goal of generating high-quality 3D models.

references.paper_title: Scene Representation Transformer: Geometry-free novel view synthesis through set-latent scene representations
references.reason: This paper introduces the Scene Representation Transformer, a key component of the proposed method for efficiently encoding 3D objects into a latent representation.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive analysis of diffusion models, which is foundational to the development and understanding of the diffusion model used in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Point-E: A system for generating 3D point clouds from complex prompts
references.reason: This paper introduces Point-E, a method for generating 3D point clouds, which serves as a strong baseline and comparison for the proposed method.
